success.title: Success!
success.content-1: The submission has been added and is now waiting to be reviewed by our volunteers.
success.content-2: You will be contacted by someone by phone in the near future to confirm your application.

formDescription.offerShelter: This is the place where you can place your ad for those in need of assistance to stay with you. Remember the announcement is voluntary and will be publicly visible. Please provide as much information as possible! Be aware that helping is also a responsibility.
formDescription.findShelter: Here you can place your ad that you are looking for a place to stay with your loved ones. Remember the announcement is voluntary and will be publicly visible. Please provide as much information as possible!
formDescription.translations: Here you can place your announcement that you can support pl-ua translation. Remember the announcement is voluntary and will be publicly visible. Please provide as much information as possible!
formDescription.offerTransport: This is where you can place your announcement to transport those in need. Remember the announcement is voluntary and will be publicly visible. Please provide as much information as possible!
formDescription.findTransport: Here you can place your ad that you are looking for transportation. Remember the announcement is voluntary and will be publicly visible. Please provide as much information as possible!
formDescription.offerHelp: This is where you can post your announcement that you would like to help in some way. Maybe you have some items to donate, maybe you can help with administrative tasks, or you want to get involved in some way. Remember the announcement is voluntary and will be publicly visible. Please provide as much information as possible!

frontpage.title: Shelter for those in need
frontpage.info-1: This is a grassroots social action site for those who want to help and for those who are looking for help!
frontpage.info-2: We connect people of good heart with those who need help!
frontpage.info-3: If you have space and are willing to host Ukrainian residents looking for a safe home, please sign up!
frontpage.info-4: If you came from Ukraine and are looking for a place where you could stay with your family, search our database!
frontpage.info-5: If you would like to help, become a volunteer, etc. anyone can help!
